plot: A waitress helps a ruined composer. When he triumphs and after a surgery he decides to marry her.
title: La mesera coja del café del puerto
plot_es: A waitress helps a ruined composer. When he triumphs and after a surgery he decides to marry her.
original_name: La mesera coja del café del puerto
plot_en: A waitress helps a ruined composer. When he triumphs and after a surgery he decides to marry her.
